message:
Hi guys. 

I have this A1932 Mac and it's no power. I get 20v when and the amps go to 0.099 go back down to 0 ans stays like that. I noticed once it went to 0.300 and that was it. No short circuits or components found and no liquid damage, no burned parts and the laptop it's in perfect condition.

PP5V_G3S -5v
PP3v3_G3S - 3v
PP1V8_G3S - 1.8v
PP3v_G3H - 3.3v

Any suggestions would be good :) I have couple of days to fix this one, then client goes abroad.

Thanks

Any liquid sign on the audio board/flex?
Did you test the board alone on the desk?
Is the machine recognized in DFU?
No signs of liquid anywhere, I checked under the microscope, but I will check again. Evey the board alone it's the same. Haven't tried DFU mode still, but I will try also
It also doesn;t go into DFU mode

You can try wire method.
Be aware, this board doesn't have dedicated pads to force DFU.
You should solder the wire from pin1/R8010 to any 1V8_SLPS2R point.
I did the Pads connection and went to step 4 installing, but it got stuck there halfway

What error do you get?

Just in case, make backup of SoC ROM, blank it and should go to DFU automatically.
